wikipedia_page.main: William Hunter (15 July 1892 – 6 November 1974) was a British hurdler. He competed in the men's 110 metres hurdles at the 1920 Summer Olympics.

response: * William Hunter (Vermont politician) (1754–1827), U.S. Representative from Vermont
